ApacheAsyncHttpSupport - Class in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client
An HTTP client implementation that is using the asynchronous Apache HTTP client to execute requests.
ApacheAsyncHttpSupport() - Constructor for class io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client.ApacheAsyncHttpSupport
Default constructor that can be used if all URIs are fully qualified and requests can be executed with a default HTTP client created with HttpAsyncClientBuilder
ApacheAsyncHttpSupport(URI) - Constructor for class io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client.ApacheAsyncHttpSupport
An alternative constructor that will resolve all paths against the given Base URI
ApacheAsyncHttpSupport(CloseableHttpAsyncClient) - Constructor for class io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client.ApacheAsyncHttpSupport
Allows providing a customised CloseableHttpAsyncClient instance to be used for all requests.
ApacheBlockingHttpSupport - Class in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client
An HTTP client implementation that is using the synchronous Apache HTTP client to execute requests.
ApacheBlockingHttpSupport() - Constructor for class io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client.ApacheBlockingHttpSupport
Default constructor that can be used if all URIs are fully qualified and requests can be executed with a default HTTP client created with HttpClientBuilder
ApacheBlockingHttpSupport(URI) - Constructor for class io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client.ApacheBlockingHttpSupport
An alternative constructor that will resolve all paths against the given Base URI
ApacheBlockingHttpSupport(CloseableHttpClient) - Constructor for class io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client.ApacheBlockingHttpSupport
Allows providing a customised CloseableHttpClient instance to be used for all requests.
